data.name: Diesel Brothers: Truck Building Simulator - Custom Tuning Parts
data.detailed_description:
Free time-limited DLC!
Get the game now and receive unique vehicle parts. Customize your legendary diesel trucks with the special bumper, exhaust, and rims.

DLC includes:
  • Exclusive Front Bumper
  • Exclusive Exhaust
  • 4 Wheel Rims in exclusive black color
Hurry up to get free in-game items. Make your pickup trucks stand out from the crowd!

Offer lasts until April 26, 2019.
data.about_the_game:
Free time-limited DLC!
Get the game now and receive unique vehicle parts. Customize your legendary diesel trucks with the special bumper, exhaust, and rims.

DLC includes:
  • Exclusive Front Bumper
  • Exclusive Exhaust
  • 4 Wheel Rims in exclusive black color
Hurry up to get free in-game items. Make your pickup trucks stand out from the crowd!

Offer lasts until April 26, 2019.
data.short_description: Grab free vehicle parts for Diesel Brothers: Truck Building Simulator. Hurry up! The offer ends soon!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit) or Newer. Doesn't support Mac OS.
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 760 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change during the development of the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit) or Newer. Doesn't support Mac OS.
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 970 8GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change during the development of the game.
